casebody.data:
Smith, Respondent, v. Bernhardt, Appellant. (Common Pleas of New York City and County, General Term. November 14, 1890.) Appeal from special term.

Argued before Daly, C. J., and Bischoff and Pryor, JJ.

J. Homer Hildreth, for appellant. Seaman & Conger, for respondent.

No opinion. Judgment and order appealed from affirmed, with costs.
